Reviews.Title: Bundle is junk, buy camera on its own!
Reviews.Author: PhotoGuy
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle impressed with the value of the contents for the price.  Boy was I wrong!  I should've bought the camera on its own and the individual pieces locally at a camera accessory store. The T3i and 18-55mm lense are great!  The 75-300mm lense is NOT the IS-USM(image stabilized, ultra sonic motor) version.  It doesn't have the image stablization which is helpful for a lense with that range.  Also the focusing is loud and slow compared to the USM version of the same lense.  The extra battery included is an off brand and is super light.  Compared to the Canon battery that comes with the camera I doubt this battery weighs 1/3 or performs for very long at all.  The SDHC 16gb card that came with the bundle is only a class 2 (the lowest, new cards are class 10), which means transfer from the camera to the card is slow, extremely slowing down the rapid fire/burst function.  The 'high speed' card reader is junk.  The 1st time I used the reader to transfer images to my computer it corrupted the SD card and gave me a 'card access error.'  I lost all my photos!  I have since found out I could've taken the card to a local camera shop and they have a rescue program to restore corrupted cards (If I had only known before I accepted the loss of some great photos and formatted the card).  The camera bag is decent quality.  The tripod is super cheap and low quality.  The neck on the tripod will not stay up (no locking feature) and is wobbly.  First time using it with a light breeze outside and the tripod nearly blew over with my camera attached!  Luckily I caught it.All in all, I would NOT recommend this package even though I do recommend the camera.  I have since had to purchase a new class 10 SDHC card, new HQ tripod, and new high speed card reader.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, kit not so great!
Reviews.Author: nurseman21
Reviews.Content: I love love love this camera, I am new to the dslr world, so am still finding my way around it, much easier thanks to an app on my iPad! The camera takes amazing pictures, and it feels quite durable as well! The shipping was so fast as well! My recommendation would be to buy the camera alone, rather than this kit, as the kit is very low quality, the bag I got was nothing near what was pictured, it came with 2-8gb sd cards, which are class 3, the cleaning kit was a cloth that looks like a dryer sheet, and a small pack of q-tips. The tripod is ok, but doesnt glide all that well when extending, and seems relatively cheap. It was nice to receive a spare battery, but those are available fairly cheap on amazon, so I would advise against spending any extra money on this kit.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera But Beware the "Kit"
Reviews.Author: BRC
Reviews.Content: I purchased this kit as a gift to my wife who has wanted a Canon DSLR for a few years.  When the package arrived, the first thing I noticed was the advertised "59 Inch Full Sized Tripod" was actually only 50 inches.  Big deal, nine inches right?  But the point is, it's not what was advertised, nor what I paid for.  Also, the 16GB Vivitar memory card that came as part of the kit was defective.  It would not hold a format from neither the camera or nor our home computers.  The kit was also missing the advertised "Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras".I contacted the seller, in this case Get It Digital, and left a voice mail to which I never received a call back.  I contacted Amazon and their stance was I could only return, not replace.  And oh by the way, it could take anywhere from one to three weeks for the money to be returned.  I spoke with my wife, who really wanted the camera and was willing to overlook the shorter tripod and missing manual, so I begrudgingly kept the product.  Once she used it we found out about the memory card issue.  So she bought another memory card from a local retailer and it works fine.The camera is incredible, takes great pictures and has many features.  The reason for my low review is for the kit, which is what's being offered.  Just beware and forewarned that you may not receive what you think you are buying.As a side-note, I left "Seller Feedback" and gave an honest account of my woes.  Only then was I contacted via email by the seller who at first wanted to send me all kinds of freebies so long as I deleted my feedback.  Once I told them I was standing by my feedback to warn potential consumers of my buying experience and was  not looking to gloss over my problems because they sent me some goodies, they became more aggressive and tried to put a spin on it that it was my fault for calling instead of emailing them.Again, the camera is a quality product that exceeds my expectations.  However, the kit was lacking and I would have been better off buying individual components.  Maybe it is different from other sellers and I just ran into a dud, but just wanted to share my experience.

Reviews.Title: Misleading
Reviews.Author: Lynn Small
Reviews.Content: The photo of the camera package with accessories offered clearly shows a camera bag. All other items in the photo are included in the order but the camera bag is not. Only by reading the product description is one aware the camera bag even though shown in the picture is not included. The seems almost intentionally misleading and leaves a unpleasant memory of my experience with shopping on Amazon.comhttp://www.amazon.com/Canon-Digital-55-250mm-Telephoto-Accessory/dp/B004QDA4A8/ref=pd_cp_p_3

Reviews.Title: Exellent camera with a good entry level kit
Reviews.Author: Tassadar
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome.  I will not go into a review of the camera specifically, as there are plenty of amazon reviews and professional reviews that can talk about how great this camera is much better than I can.  DISCLAIMER:  I am not a professional photographer.  I am just like many of you folks deciding on your first DSLR upgrading from a point and shoot.  So take my opinions for what that is worth.Instead I will be going into some detail about the kit.  I bought my kit from Focus Camera.  The other sellers may have different kits, I am not sure.  All of the items came in their original retail packaging, like I picked them all out at the store myself.-The main item in the kit is of course the Cannon T3i.  It came brand new it its original retail box with all paperwork and accessories.  It did not come without a box or just wrapped in plastic like some other reviewers experienced with other sellers.  This camera is made in Taiwan.-The extra lens is an authentic Cannon EF 75-300 f/4-5.6 III and does not have the image stabilization or micro motor.  This lens retails by itself for $200 and alone makes this kit a good deal for beginners.  Like all the items in the kit, it came in its original retail packaging.  It is made in Malaysia.Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens for Canon SLR Cameras-The 16 GB memory card is a Sony SF-16NX High Speed class 10 SDHC memory card.  It is not a particularly extra fast card, but does meet the class 10 specifications.  On the packaging, Sony claims it is recommended for HD video and continuous shooting for DSLR cameras, and I have not run into any issues.  Made in Taiwan.Sony SF16NX/TQM 16GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card-The bag is a Vivitar Coco Series Gadget Bag.  It has plenty of room for the camera with kit lens attached, 75-300 lens, and extra accessories like the spare battery.  There is a well-padded main chamber with adjustable dividers, and three zippered pockets on the sides.  I am quite pleased with this bag, and am using it.  It is well padded and constructed.  It comes with a shoulder strap and a padded handle.  The Velcro on the inside could probably be a little better, but the price is sure right. Part # VIV-DC-59 and made in China.Vivitar Padded SLR Gadget Bag for SLR Cameras - Large-The tripod is a Vivtar of unknown model.  I tried searching for the exact model and could not find it.  It appears to be a Vivitar VPT1250 but 9 inches longer and all black.  The tripod folds out to be 49", and then gains another 10" from extending the neck all the way up.  I found that with the neck extended even a little, the camera became way too wobbly.  It feels stable enough at 49".  It does not have an accessory/weight hook, and just uses rubber feet, no spikes.  The tripod is built extremely cheaply, and I don't know in what country (I assume China).  So far it is working fine for me.Vivitar VPT1250 50-Inch Tripod (Black/Silver)-The spare battery is a Xit Photo LP-E8 lithium battery.  It has a 1750 mAh rated capacity but feels lighter and cheaper than the Cannon 1120 mAh LP-E8 that comes with the camera.  I have no doubt the capacity is overstated, but seems to last about the same amount of time as the Cannon battery.  Part# XTLPE8 and made in China.Xit XTLPE8 1750mAh Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Canon LP-E8 (Grey)-The lens cleaning kit is a focus camera 5pc kit that comes with a little bottle of fluid, blower brush, lens tissue, soft fiber cloth, and some cotton swabs.  It is plenty sufficient to get started.  Part# FC-CL5, China.-The kit includes a DVD, not a book.  It is from JumpStart Guides and is 60 minutes long.  It is titled "Focus, Digital-SLR photography in a Snap".  Same Focus brand as the lens kit.  I did not watch it as I purchased the book "Canon EOS T3i/600D From Snapshots to Great Shots" by Jeff Revell and absolutely love it.  From CanadaFocus Digital SLR Photography in a Snap Jumpstart Guide DVD-The wireless remote is a Zeikos ZE-WRC5 remote with no built in flashlight.  Small and cheap but works fine. Make sure to turn off auto focus and turn off auto-off to get the remote to work. ChinaZeikos ZE-WRC5 Wireless Remote for Canon-The screen protector is a Zeikos universal screen guard.  It comes with three 3"x5" protectors that you have to cut to fit, plus a squeegee card.  Works fine, but hard to apply without getting bubbles like most guards . Part# ZE-SG26R, ChinaZeikos ZE-SG26 Set of 3 Screen Protectors (3 x 5-Inches)-The card reader is a Xtreme multi card reader/writer usb 2.0 stick.  It has three slots in it and supports SD/SDHC/microSD/MS Pro Duo,M2 cards.  Part #32599 made in ChinaXtreme 32588 USB Memory Card Reader-The memory card wallet is a black Vivitar VIV-MW-003 three card wallet made of durable nylon and fake leather.  Holds three cards, basic and acceptable. China-The 6 foot HDMI cable is a mini hdmi to reguluar hdmi cable.  Generic of unknown brand, but well made.This kit is good for beginners.  None of it is professional quality but the kit works fine.  With the information I have provided, you can now research the individual items to decide if this kit is right for you.  Most of the items are sold individually here on amazon, so just copy the name or part number of the item and you can read reviews about them.  I am glad I went with the kit as I am a casual user that has no need for the more expensive stuff.  I would recommend this to anybody entering the DSLR world.  I think the 75-300 lens, which I was going to buy anyway, makes this kit worth it.  It is almost like if you bought the 75-300 lens, and then got a whole bunch of cheap but useful free stuff with it.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk kit
Reviews.Author: alice
Reviews.Content: I'm a photographer, and I bought this for my niece, everything is very cheap quality, the camera seems fine but makes me insecure and question the authenticity since every single piece on the kit is junk. The camera bag is not the camera bag illustrated on the advertising. DO NOT BUY this kit, saving $100 is not worthed since you most likely will need to replace the items soon. Also the camera and lenses ship wrapped on plastic, canon products are shipped inside their own product box, wrapped in a soft cloth, as i said before very questioning if this is a real canon product. Very disappointed, I will never buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Package is a joke. Camera is great
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: Camera is great; But this package deal is a complete waste! Buy the camera separate and build your own package. For the price difference, between the camera + lens and accessory kit, you can get better quality and you can spend money on accessories that are more important to you, like filters. All of the accessories are extremely cheap.Everything except the lens, the camera, and the HDMI cord is a waste. Buy it separately and get more for your money. I paid 970 after shipping. The items need to be upgraded or the price needs to be lower.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Amateur181 "Amateur181"
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of theses kits from Sunset. The camera is great. I did not get all of the accessories right away. Once Sunset did ship me everything, I was very disappointed. The lens hood is difficult to use. The tripod is too light. The card reader doesn't work. The camera bag is already coming unsewed. The SD card is too slow to use the rapid shot mode on the camera. The spare battery is not an LP-E8. It is a generic that the camera has trouble reading the power level of. The DVD guide is pretty humorous though.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Luis Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of theses kits. The camera is great. I did not get all of the accessories. Once the seller did ship me some of the rest, I was very disappointed. The card reader and filters still not receive them. The camera bag is not at all as it shows in the picture. The SD card is ok. The spare battery ok.

Reviews.Title: Pleased!
Reviews.Author: S Jo
Reviews.Content: I was overall pleased with my purchase. The only downside was the size of the camera bag. If you are going to bundle a package that has 2 lenses in it, provide a bag that fits them both with the camera and all the accesories!

Reviews.Title: Picture is Misleading
Reviews.Author: Wilbert Whitley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this "Bundle" and realized that the bag was not included in the Order. I encourage Everyone to read exactly what is in the package. DO NOT GO BY THE PICTURE! I am refusing the order when it gets here because I feel I was deceived. I will admit that part of the confusion was by my mistake of not reaing or actually rushing through the description that was posted. I still feel that the Picture that was displayed deserves the rating it is given.

Reviews.Title: I do not vote for this Bundle
Reviews.Author: Prado
Reviews.Content: Camera is really good but the kit it comes with is not worth it. I had to buy these stuff separately which landed me to say this as unfair deal.But for this price for a SLR beginner, it can be OK!!

Reviews.Title: Great SLR with handy features.
Reviews.Author: JayLev
Reviews.Content: This SLR is lightweight and compact, yet has all the auto and manual features for easy picture taking.  The shutter is quick and quiet.  The 18-55 lens is great for wider angle shots.  The 75-300 lens is a great telephoto.  I have been happy with the long battery life (capable of several hundred photos), and the tilt-out screen is awesome for over-the-head or from-the-ground shots.  Photos are superb, and the auto ISO feature is handy and accurate.  The auto settings do have a tendency to white out the sky sometimes, but can be corrected manually or during processing.  I haven't tried the video yet.  Overall I have been very satisfied so far.  The complete package is pretty much everything an amateur needs to get started.  If you're upgrading from a point-and-shoot, or even an older SLR, you will be thrilled with the improvement in features, speed, and quality.

Reviews.Title: Bundle is of low quality...Camera itself is great.
Reviews.Author: Aman
Reviews.Content: First of all, let me remark: My review is pertinent to this bundle shipped by Beach Camera. I bought this bundle less than a week ago and in that time, Amazon has switched the store offering this deal 3 times (first Beach Camera, then Focus Camera, and now 47th Street Photo).Secondly, the camera itself is great. If you're here, you've probably decided that you're going with the Canon Rebel T3i, and frankly, it's simply an amazing camera for any beginner. So 5 stars for Canon here.Thirdly, if you are buying the bundle, think about this for a minute: Is it worth buying this bundle from a 3rd-party retailer? Are you really going to use the specific accessories included in this bundle? (You can find the T3i + 18-55mm lens + 75mm-300mm lens bundles for $699 from most big-name retailers, i.e. BestBuy).Now in regards to what is included in the bundle: overall, the quality of the non-Canon accessories, is generally terrible.What was (supposed) to be included in my bundle:Canon Brand Accessories:  - 75MM - 300MM LENS: Very nice beginner lens. Feels nice and heavy (made of high quality) and has allowed me to shoot subjects (mostly birds) at a distance.3rd Party Accessories:  - A 16 GB SD CARD: (Did not arrive with my package! I had to contact BeachCamera and Amazon separately in order to be refunded for the value of the SD card. This was very disappointing)  - A TRIPOD: (mine was by the brand 'Pro Series'); this tripod was far from a 'pro' level tripod. It was extremely, extremely, extremely flimsy, and after opening it and trying it once, I decided it wasn't worth using again.  - EXTRA BATTERY: Of an unknown brand. Like everyone else has noted, it feels considerably lighter than Canon's own included battery, but it's not a bad additional battery. The battery life is only slightly shorter than Canon's battery. So this was essentially a solid backup battery.  - BAG (Digital Concepts brand): The bag I received was made by a company called Digital Concepts, but other reviewers have reported getting different bags (probably each vendor uses a different bag). The bag is pretty lousy; it completely lacks any compartments, and has no pockets of any kind as well. This bag normally isn't even sold online (I tried searching for it). It feels flimsy and really should be reinforced more. Size wise it's pretty portable at 11" x 6" x 6"; it can hold all of the accessories in this bundle, with the exception of the tripod. If you weren't carrying around accessories, you could house the DSLR body + 4 lenses. If you truly feel you don't need a 'strong' case for the DSLR, then you'll probably be okay with case, but this is an accessory I've already replaced with a new bag.  - Zeikos ZE-FLK55 55mm Multi-Coated 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD) (Zeikos brand): These filters are actually pretty awesome. There are 3 filters included(a UV filter for lens protection/sun, a CP filter for glare minimization, & a FLD filter for white balance correction). Let's note that they fit on both of the lenses included in this package, and that the retail value for these filters is a miserly $7.17 as of this review. They don't really do much to your image, but most photographers recommend that lens filters act as a good lens protector when in use. The lens filters also come with a small carrying pouch made of leather. This pouch is a great addition.  - WIRELESS REMOTE (Zeikos brand): I personally feel this is essentially a useless accessory for any beginner (such as myself). I haven't really used it, but it appears to be cheaply made. Nevertheless, it does include a 5 year warranty, which speaks to the quality of Zeikos.  - SD CARD HOLDER: Made of some type of cheap leather; it's an SD card holder...it gets the job done simply put.  - 3 PIECE DELUXE CLEANING KIT (Zeikos brand): The '3 pieces' are 5 Q-tips, a lens cleaning solution, and a soft cloth (similar to the ones used to clean pairs of glasses). It's a cheap kit...but the solution is a quick-evaporating mix that works fairly well. Too bad that with frequent use, this kit wouldn't last very long...  - HDMI CABLE: This is a very high quality cable...feels and looks strong and durable.  - LCD PROTECTORS: Comes with 3 LCD protectors; the LCD screen on the T3i folds inwards (it's a swivel screen) after use to protect the screen, so I never bothered installing these.  - 25 FREE PRINTS: Never received these...didn't bother to tell Amazon, because I figured I wouldn't use them.  - DVD GUIDE (Focus Brand): Never received this either...didn't really care.***OVERALL***: I ordered from Beach Camera and was missing 3 items (the SD Card, 25 free prints and DVD guide). Overall, I felt that the packaged goods that accompany the camera are lousy. I ended up replacing the carrying case and SD card anyway, and the ~$8.00 lens filters are the only accessory I truly use from this bundle. If I could do it over, I would've just bought the camera with the 2 lenses WITHOUT this bundle.

Reviews.Title: Missing items and Poor Service
Reviews.Author: Lon E.
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review here because I can get NO response from Amazon on my purchase from them, in conjunction with Beach Camera. I have sent 2 emails directly to Amazon specifically about this purchase with no answers whatsoever.  I did not receive all the merchandise that was part of this bundle I paid for. The purchase came all in one box, was missing 1 16 GB SDHC Secure Digital card, the DVD Guide to Digital SLR cameras, nothing about the Bonus 256 quality prints, and the camera bag was not the same as described in the bundle/package deal. Be very wary of purchasing from Beach Camera and getting any satisfaction from Amazon regarding your purchase or any problems. They still have not answered my mail after two attempts on 7/1/2013 and 7/2/2013.I will not rate the Canon camera at this point.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal For a New Amateur
Reviews.Author: C. R. Williams
Reviews.Content: I've seen a lot of reviews complaining about the quality of the bundled items, but even if you just factor in the cost of buying a zoom lens on top of the standard kit body and lens, you're saving around $50 by buying this bundle. The 70-300mm lens is Canon-branded, and it almost seems heavier than the camera body itself (feels like a quality item).I received my order less than a week from the date of purchase, which I was happy with. All of the items were packed nicely and worked well out of the box. Not all of the accessories are super great quality, but a lot of it is useful. The SD card is fast, the extra battery is handy, and the tripod is light but sturdy.There was an issue with the 70-300mm lens, which had a speck of dirt or dust under the front piece of glass. I fired off an email to customer service the evening I received the package, and received a response with a free shipping label by the next afternoon. I sent out the lens last Friday, and received the replacement today. It appears to be defect-free and is working well. I'm still giving a 5-star rating because these sorts of things happen with mass-produced items, and the supplier (Focus Camera) handled it very quick and very well.I'm not a professional photographer by any means; I'm an avid iPhoneographer, and bought this because I plan on spending the summer in an area where there's no cell phone service. I want to take pictures but it seems dumb to use my phone.I've only used this camera to take a few pictures so far, but it seems fast and the pictures look good on my computer. Also, it has the same number of megapixels as the brand-new T5i. I know megapixels aren't everything, but I think that if you're looking to get in to SLR photography and don't necessarily need the newest and greatest Canon model, this is a good camera to get without worrying it'll be obsolete any time soon.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera is great! The kit not so great.
Reviews.Author: L.J.O
Reviews.Content: The camera is Awesome but the "super bundle" is poor.  Beach Camera did not send me all of the items that were shown in the picture. (card reader, remote, SD card wallet, etc.)  I emailed them and explained that I was missing a number of items. They quickly sent me a few items that were missing along with a broken tripod.  I tried contacting them once again about the broken tripod but have not heard back from them.  Which was almost a month ago.  The quality of the items that are in the "super bundle" are very cheap and misleading.  They use the good o'l bait and switch technique here.  Anyways, I kinda knew what I was getting into when ordering this from the other reviews but for what I paid for the Camera and extra lens it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle/Package!!!
Reviews.Author: Hosagi
Reviews.Content: PROSPackage: shipped faster than I thought and arrived with everything intact.Two Lens: (18-55mm and 75-300mm) are both great and high quality.Canon Rebel T3i Body: it self is absolutely amazing with everything you need for both Photo and Video shoot.Lens Clean Kit: is alright, a small plus, but would careless if I didn't have it.USB SD Card Reader: works well and is decently fast transferSD Card: is a 16 GB class 10 and seems reliable and works wellSD Card Wallet: is useful if you have many SD CardsAll the Cords/Cables: work well and the HDMI cable is always a plusSecond Battery: that comes with is great since you usually need two batteries when you are shooting outdoors or travelingTripod: is kinda cheap, but for beginners it works well and does its jobDVD Guide: is actually not for Canon Rebel T3i, but for Canon Rebel XS. However, it is very informative for beginners and helps a lot!Price: pretty good price for what you all getCONSCamera Bag is too flimsy and not reliable. The divider inside the camera doesn't stick well so I'm afraid my lens would bounce around.I ended up just buying another Camera Bag for $30.I wish it came with a lens filter and lens hood cause I ended up buying them as well for my lens protection.OVERALLEven though the Camera Bag was pretty bad, if I bought all of them separately, it would have cost much more. Therefore, I would recommend buying this bundle/package for beginners. However, if you don't feel the need for the 75-300mm lens and a camera bag that you won't use and a beginners tripod, you should look into some other bundle/package.

Reviews.Title: Focus Camera is commenting FRAUD. - Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Len
Reviews.Author: David M. Kurtz
Reviews.Content: I had the same issue as one of the other posters.  What is Focus Camera up too?  This listed this last week as a deal and I ordered on and today they cancelled it.  They also listed the same deal on eBay.  I wonder if any shipped?  What is this a bait and switch scam.  Focus Camera is commenting FRAUD.Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens + 11pc Bundle 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit (Electronics)Made a legitimate purchase for this, and they flat out just cancelled the order. The item suddenly was unavailable after I made the legitimate purchase. Then it was cancelled and put back on sale at a higher price. Was not offered any consolation or any sort of gesture to make up for this horrible experience. I am not satisfied at all.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: H_Huck "Huck"
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to pick this up based on some reviews, but decided to pull the trigger on it so I didn't have to piece together my  own package.I was very impressed upon opening the box.  Some of the items seem like they're bought off an eBay store from China, but a package like this it's almost expected.But, if you're looking at this package, you're more than likely just starting out, and just want something to get your started in DSLR photography.  Still, I highly recommend this!!It gives you what you need to get started, including an extra lens.  This will let you get started messing around with settings, taking pics, etc., without making too big of an investment.After you've been taking pics for a while, you'll be able to pick and choose what accessories you'll need to upgrade, and what else you'll need to order.I should review the camera on its own page, but I'll just say this: The T3i is a VERY good starter camera.  Easy to use controls.  Don't be scared of all the settings, it's digital so you wont waste any film by messing around and trying different things!Overall, highly recommended for someone just starting in photography.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal...Happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: tbeasleyjr
Reviews.Content: Love the camera & the lenses. With the price, everything else in the bundle was just a bonus. The bag, battery & flash card were my favorites of the extras. Bag is Focus brand and has plenty of storage for what I need, card is Sony and works great & the battery is an off brand that holds a nice charge. Haven't used the other stuff yet. My card reader did not work on my MacBookPro, but I can just hook the camera straight into the computer with one of the cables provided & rip photos with iPhoto...no biggie. Really happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Package & Excellent Customer Service by Focus Camera
Reviews.Author: Faven Yirdaw
Reviews.Content: I'm writing another review on this product because Amazon will not let me edit my previous review.When I got my shipment, I noticed that I was missing 4 items (Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet, Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors, Focus 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit and the Free 25 Quality Prints.  I contacted Amazon regarding these missing items and was told although this kit was put together and sent by Amazon, they were out of stock and that they could not send me a replacement kit.  I asked if they could simply send me the four missing items instead of replacing the entire kit and I was told they can't do that.  I was disappointed because I absolutely love the camera and wanted to keep it.  I finally contacted Focus Camera and explained the situation, that I didn't want my money back or have to return the camera, I just wanted the four missing items that I paid for.  The Focus Camera rep I dealt with assured me she understood my situation and told me they wanted to work with me to remedy the situation.  The rep. offered to ship me the four missing items with no strings attached.  I got my shipment two days after it was shipped out.  They even provided me with tracking info so I can follow up.  Like I said, I absolutely love this camera but after this incident, I absolutely appreciated the level of customer service I had with Focus Camera.  I will definitely purchase future camera/camera kit(s) from them.  I highly recommend them to anyone looking to purchase a camera or camera kit.

Reviews.Title: If you are a beginner, then this kit is for you!
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: There are several negative reviews here about the "kit".  I am just beginning photography as a hobby, read some reviews on good starting cameras, found my way to the Canon T3i, then my way to Amazon, and eventually this kit... if that sounds like you, then you you are like me, and this review may just be for you.I think a lot of people are being way too harsh on this kit. I think it is a GREAT kit, and absolutely everything I need to get started. Personally, I don't see me "upgrading" any of these items for quite some time.-The bag is perfect, with shoulder strap, pockets all around, room to grow into, weather protecting flaps for the pockets (so water doesn't seep into the zipper).-The tripod is like any other generic tripod I have ever seen, with a nice shoulder-strapped bag. It is 100% capable of holding a camera still for delicate shots with both the lenses that came with it.  Are $600 tripods better?  sure, but this one is free... not sure why all the hate for it.-The kit also comes with a Sony (yes Sony) high-speed (40 mb/s, which is fast) SD card... and that is way nicer then I expected. It also comes with a USB to SD-card adapter for your computer, which is pretty useful for quick and easy transferring of photos to your computer.- The directional DVD is about 1 hour long and offers some great tips for getting started and maintaining the camera.- Back-up battery is just that... a back-up... it works.- The camera and both lenses are AMAZING... I just went in my back yard and shot a picture of an un-blossomed flower sprouting and my wife is already asking if we can put it on the wall.- The cleaning kit comes with enough supply to get started and gave me a good idea of things I will need to "resupply" down the road.- The remote is the only "cheapy" item in my book, but it does work, and with care won't need to be replaced any time soon.Overall, there are a lot of negative reviews suggesting you get the camera and lenses, then go buy all these things separately. If you do the math, you are saving hundreds of dollars with this kit... I would recommend buying this kit, then be happy... or if you have that extra hundreds of dollars, then buy more lenses (like the 55mm f/1.8) because this is absolutely a serviceable kit.  You get exactly what you think this is.

Reviews.Title: BAD KIT!!
Reviews.Author: Byron
Reviews.Content: I'm a little bit skeptical about the quality of the camera or if its really new. however when i tried both lenses and the camera itself, they worked like a charm, very happy with them. however, the bag looked like it had been dropped in a puddle of mud then stored without drying in a moldy basement inside of its bag. it has stains of what it seems to be mud or it might be mold all over it, and it smells like very strong mold. I haven't tried the rest of the kit but for the price  I think I deserve a new, well take care of product.  i will update you on the rest.

Reviews.Title: Camera is good other items are not gr8
Reviews.Author: Naveen Chitturi
Reviews.Content: Canon dslr was perfect, but the other things with this package such as tripod, camera bag,remote etc are of low quality. But these are worth for the price we are paying.  About the service, the dealer was awesome. For some reason memory card was missing in the package. I informinformed the same and with in no time they sent it to me. Thanks for their service.

Reviews.Title: Good camera - bad combo - missed itens - poor quality
Reviews.Author: Jose Matias Neto
Reviews.Content: Camera is good but the combo is not so good.Bag is very poor, completed different than what you can see in the picture here.Also, I did not received the follow itens promissed in the offer:Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3I
Reviews.Author: shadow1888
Reviews.Content: So far camera has been great! easy to use and it came with a full manual( most recent electronics I have ordered you have had to download the manual) Abe's of Maine is tops!!!

Reviews.Title: Best SLR for the money !!
Reviews.Author: Joe Jamison
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for those just starting out. It takes excellent pictures and video. Best SLR for the money hands down !!!

Reviews.Title: Good Kit
Reviews.Author: RonPavan
Reviews.Content: The kit was a good value and loe the camera.  The Kit was missing a few of the minor items (but annoying) such as the SD case and the lens cleaning component.

Reviews.Title: Cannon
Reviews.Author: Shadia Portilla
Reviews.Content: It did not come With all accesories in the picture shown, I am very unhappy. Do not promise things that you are not sending

Reviews.Title: Focus Cameras
Reviews.Author: Julia J Johnson
Reviews.Content: Two Cameras in 6 mos, One -first one purchased started acting up could get no help from anyone Second started acting up second day I had it still know help from anyone contacted Canon myself then e-mails started arriving with concerns as if they couldn't understand why im unhappy Lost 4 jobs to not having equitment and I have to pay to return cameras IM PISSED

Reviews.Title: Camera scam-Buyer beware of this seller
Reviews.Author: M. Stalvey "Georgia resident"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera bundle on sale on 3/28.  Today I get an email that the price was incorrect and my order had been cancelled but I can buy it at the correct price.  Sounds like I am not the only one who has had this problem.  The order disappears from your bought items but I have everything printed out if anyone needs it.  In Georgia, an item has to be sold for the marked price, regardless of whether or not it is correct.

Reviews.Title: Great camera but need better quality control on your included lens care kit.
Reviews.Author: chuck phillips
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera. Meets my expectations. The lens cleaning kit that came with it was not fit for use. The cleaning solution had some kind of contaminant in it. There were black particles and chunks suspended in it which could possibly ruin the lens coating if used. Also the tripod is quite unstable at the telescoping mount junction when raised.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: julianrojas
Reviews.Content: The camera is great ... The tripod is awful is not secure and your camaera can falls down it happens to me once and have to buy another ptripos ... The bag its too small but .the camera lenses are great thats the reason cause i dont give five stars

Reviews.Title: Beware of Zoom Lens
Reviews.Author: Shelly Budinger
Reviews.Content: Notice that the zoom lens in this bundle is NOT an image stabilizing lens.  If you are okay with that, then you may like the bundle.  I returned for another seller that provided an image stabilizing zoom lens.

Reviews.Title: Great deal and pictures!
Reviews.Author: joy
Reviews.Content: I'm a super beginner, and this camera is so easy to use. I bought it because I just can't wrap my head around spending hundreds or even a thousand dollars on one professional photography sitting when I can buy my own camera and teach myself. I did just that. I've taken some professional looking photos of my children. I get tons of compliments on the pictures. I find that using the larger lens is easier to use and capture near and far. I love the camera, and am kicking myself for not getting one sooner!

Reviews.Title: Remote control is not as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Kelly Holzman "Kelly"
Reviews.Content: Everything in this package was as promised except for the remote control. The remote control does not work a camera. It is for a TV and it is junk. When I emailed about it I was told it was a free gift and basically too bad. It was not a free gift, it is advertised in the bundle as a remote control for the camera and was one of the pieces I was excited about for family pictures and I now have to go out and buy the right thing. Very unhappy with the customer service but pleased with the majority of the bundle.

Reviews.Title: Love my rebel
Reviews.Author: N. Giampapa
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing. The accessories that came with this bundle were just what I was looking for. There were a few junk accessories that went in the trash but for the camera, lenses, tripod and camera bag it was worth it. Now I'm saving toward upgraded lenses. The ones that came with the camera were god starter lenses though.

Reviews.Title: User friendly camera
Reviews.Author: Regina Anto
Reviews.Content: The camera is very user friendly.  Takes great pictures for the price.  Camera shakes a bit with zoom lens on it, but auto focus takes care of clarity.  Fun camera for intermediate user.

Reviews.Title: best ever
Reviews.Author: four kids momma
Reviews.Content: omg must get!!!!!! love this camera to death. I highly recommend it. great quality great pics. video is not 100% good

Reviews.Title: Great gift for loved one
Reviews.Author: Linda DeCota "retired teacher"
Reviews.Content: Camera was for my husband and he loves it.  It has revived his interest in photography.  Price was good. Some of the features are new to him and he is having fun with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: bryan
Reviews.Content: Great camera, takes great pictures.  I like that all the features came with it.  The camera takes great action pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: ALBERT ESQUIVEL
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.... it takes great pictures.  All the added "goodies" that it came with have kept me entertained for days.  Quality product!

Reviews.Title: Good camara
Reviews.Author: wsz6132
Reviews.Content: A good camara with excellent quality.  But there is no protector for the zoom. You should be careful for your zoom.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Janet K. Moore
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the camera.  The video and picture quality is excellent for the price point. The tri-pod included in the kit is substandard by far, thus the 4 stars instead of 5.  One item not included is a harness, but a friend gifted me one so that I could take videos with a smoother result.  Overall, I am very happy with the product, I had hoped that all items included would match the quality of the central purchase of the camera.  A more sturdy tri-pod would have garnered this purchase as a 5 star.  If I have just purchased the camera, again 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Just get the camera. Skip the kit.
Reviews.Author: steven petrucci
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is great. I have a pretty good idea of what I'm doing but there is always room for improvement. As for the accessories that came with the kit:1. The bag was not the same bag that was advertised and it's crap.2. Tripod is crap and I wouldn't trust it to prop a door open.3. Did not come with the Focus TV Flashlight Remote like advertised.Overall I'm not upset or anything. I am very excited about the camera but I'm not planning on using any of the other gear that was included in the kit. I either didn't get it or it's such crap that I don't even want to bother using it. Yes, I would recommend the camera but that's about it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amy W.
Reviews.Content: Great camera package! I'm still trying out all the settings but even on auto it takes great pictures! Very we'll made and easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: NyBobby
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my Wife and she is loving, taking pictures of everything.Thanks Amazon for the great price and keeping the Wife happy.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Salman P.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this produce to gift to my wife on her birthday. The product arrived on time. I think it was a pretty reasonable deal as well. Cheaper tha what it is listed at other place. Everything looks good so far. We haven't started to use the camera yet. I am sure it will work jsut fine too.

Reviews.Title: Must buy!!
Reviews.Author: Brian McCown
Reviews.Content: Canon never disappoints. Great professional camera for an amazing price.  Even the novice looks like a pro. The bundle is well worth the extra few dollars.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad intro..
Reviews.Author: Dave Dork
Reviews.Content: Most of the products contained within this kit is good. Love the camera and telephoto lens. Good intoductory kit. DVD tutorials are nice. Extra battery lasts just as long as the Canon. Only downfall in my opinion is the bag and tri-pod. The bag is just fair in size. Dislike the compartments on the inside and feel using velcro for versatility is so-so. I don't care for having  rough velcro plastic exposed to expensive equipment. It tends not to stick all that well to proect it. The tri-pod I do not lie at all. Poorly made. Does not even sit even horizontally and no way to correct it. It has a tilt to the right and is pretty useless.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am using this camera for 1 month now and it works perfect. Also other accessories like tripod, memory card, remote control are also good. I would really like to put in my review comments again after 1 year.

Reviews.Title: Cool camera
Reviews.Author: Mahesh Suragimath
Reviews.Content: Its easy to use, and captures amazing pictures. The required info to better the performance is easily accessible. Simply superb

Reviews.Title: Great entry level DSLR!
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera set. Comes with everything you need to get started and takes great photos. Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Up's & Downs of Mail ordering
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Well it arrived to day I just got my Camera and everything that was advertised with it. I've always been a point and shoot camera person, so you can probably imagine the over whelming feeling when I pulled that T3i out of the box and saw all those buttons. This is my first camera that I can control the lens on so I'm looking forward to lots of fun and a new learning experience. I read a lot of the reviews while I was waiting for my package to arrive. After a bout the fifth one. I began to see a lot of the same thing. I'd like to address some of those. First of in a package like this one people don't realize that in reality the 11 pc bundle is not going to be something to write home to mother about and knit picking it apart only makes you look confused. I mean think about it what did you buy the camera or the 11 pc bundle.That bundle is a beginners bundle to get you started. and while I will admit that the tripod is made of plastic and not very well it does have something that I've only seen on the more expensive tripods and that it the quick release mount on the top. and so what if the 16 gig card isn't top of the line or the cleaning kit has q-tips with it. big whoop, I'm still trying to figure out what that TV/flashlight is for..lolevery body complained about the fact that the gadget bag was poorly made.well I looked the one over that cam with mine and its not the greatest bag but it holds all my gear and than some. and yes at a later date i will be buying a canon bag. I mean common now its a canon camera so I thing putting it in the proper bag would only be fair.I've taken several photos with it already. nothing I want to share just test photo to see what they will look like and try out the play back feature on the camera. tomorrow I put my T3i to the real test sun up to sun down and a whole lot of shooting in between. In all honesty I feel I got what I paid for. My biggest complaint would have to go to Fedex the people that handled the shipping. They left the box everything came in right on the door so that when I opened the door I knocked the box over on the porch. they didn't knock, ring the bell or acknowledge they had even been there. I live in an apartment building on the first floor. is it really that hard to remember to knock on a door?

Reviews.Title: works for me
Reviews.Author: david buttler
Reviews.Content: The package was as expected.  I was surprised that the SDHC card was a class 10 card and was 16 gb.  The only thing in the pack that seemed to be chincy was the remote and the cleaning kit.  Everything else was pretty good quality, or as you would expect with this kind of package.  For 750.00 you cannot expect a professional level bag, tri-pod or cleaning kit.  The 75-300 lense was a bit of a let down due to the lack of image stabilization, and the bag was pretty much useless for the amount of items to place in it.  I just dumped it and used the Canon bag that I had with the previous camera.

Reviews.Title: Remote control is missing.
Reviews.Author: James A Willoughby Jr
Reviews.Content: Everything works great but the remote control is missing from the kit and the camera bag is not the same quality as the one pictured.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Alison Shingary
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the great deal, I love my new camera with the two lenses. My husband is even learning how to use it!

Reviews.Title: Camera kit did not come in full..
Reviews.Author: Smile
Reviews.Content: Beachcamera did not deliver the full order. I had my tripod and filter kit missing. Also the packaging was so flimsy for such a delicate thing.Imagine the time and energy u have to spend behind this after you pay for your order...

Reviews.Title: Great combo!!!
Reviews.Author: Visual8
Reviews.Content: I am a semi pro video and photo worker, and this works great for starters. Nice lenses, excellent camera, the bag suits perfectly. Battery is an issue for me though... It will not drain fast, but used to the type of nature travels and long trips away from an ac outlet that i make, i should get another battery (im talking 2 or 3 days using the camera without recharging).The tripod is what made me put a 4 star review. It's practically a toy tripod. Mine already broke, but still works for some stuff though... But in the end it's a regular piece.Great value in the very end!!!

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Ravi Tiwari
Reviews.Content: I received it on time and camera was new as displayed. camera bag is also quite good. but other accessory in this bundle was not up to the mark.but overall i am quite happy with this deal.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: J&A Sunshine
Reviews.Content: We love this camera! Have no complaints, however there is a lot to learn about it. This is a great kit but you will need a sturdier tripod. All in all, great purchase at a great price.....

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Moses Soudipour
Reviews.Content: Truely great camera.I needed a camera for evey day use and this one lives up to my expectation. This is my second camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Digital
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Slaton "Tina Oswald"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera it is so simple to use and it take beautiful photos.  I used to use a canon power shot and decided I wanted to try the Canon EOS Rebel, I bought this one to replace the digital camera I had and my Canon Rebel 35mm.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: lhovan
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for all types of picture taking. The price is really good with all you get in the package. Couldn't find this package anywhere for the price. The delievery was fast.

Reviews.Title: EOS Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Rah3
Reviews.Content: The best price available at the time of purchase for an extremely easy to use camera for a first-time DSLR user.  The  camera is easy to use and well designed with a full range of functions that are easily understood.  The 2 lenses provide for both normal close work and distance telephoto.  The package gave me an immediate upgrade from a point and shoot and was almost as easy to use, but provides me with a very substantial gain in photo quality and shooting options as I master more of its capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Stay away from this company
Reviews.Author: Christopher F.
Reviews.Content: I ordered a few cameras from them because the price was great.  Wanting to protect my purchase, I also purchased extended warranties for them.  Well, they cancelled my orders and it took a few days for them to respond to my requests for more information.  There only response was there was a "pricing issue" and they can't do anything about the warranty because they didn't sell it.  this means that if they don't like there price, they can cancel the order at any time and they won't honor the pricing put on their store.  STAY AWAY!!!! And go to a more reputable place.

Reviews.Title: Camera was defective
Reviews.Author: LoveToRead "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: This is without a doubt the most disappointing item I have purchased from Amazon.Received the shipment.  Looks great and I happily charged the battery and popped it in the camera.I was very excited to give this camera a run through.  As I take photos in manual mode, I wanted to insure I could change the shutter speed, ISO and aperture prior to being in the field. This very weekend I have two exciting photo opportunities!So, change the shutter speed.  Check.Change the ISO.  Check.Change the aperture.  Nothing.  Review the manual to find out how to change the aperture as this just had to be operator error.  Looks like I am doing it correctly so I called a neighbor/friend.  This is the friend who recommended and is also the proud owner of the Rebel T3i.I hop over and ask "How do you change the aperture?".  She demos and it is exactly as described in the manual.  I have my new camera side by side with hers.  I follow the exact same steps - nothing.So, back in the box it goes to be returned.I will miss the two photo opportunities this weekend due to the defective camera.  I will not get a refund for a few weeks.I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, questionable accessories
Reviews.Author: Wwitner
Reviews.Content: As a whole, this is a nice package.  The camera especially is excellent.  The flip out screen is very convenient, and the quality of images is excellent.  Also great are the included lenses, bag, and memory card.  The tripod and remote, however, are a different story.  The tripod is extremely cheap and broke within the first few times using it.  Also, the remote is useless.  No adequate documentation on its use is included, and an internet search turned up nothing.  Overall, though, it's a good price, but the bundle itself is low-quality.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to a digital 35mm lately and I love it.  It takes pictures with ease and clarity I didn't realize I was missing.  I enjoy the simplicity of using it.  The kit was wonderful.  It had everything I could want to begin my journey taking pictures.  Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: the best camera I ever owned... I am a beginner
Reviews.Author: cyndi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camerae from davis max and was very pleased with the price and package. I am a beginner and have already photographed a graduation party.  I plan to go to the mountains and continue to take pictures. This was a great investment, I am truly enjoying myself. (note: pick up a dvd  on the camera it explains eveything about it and how to shoot) at least it gets you started. Thanks davis max look forward to doing business with you in the future. Cyndi

Reviews.Title: Did not get the Tripod in KIT
Reviews.Author: Harsha
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product KIT on thanks giving and i was expecting this order to have all those mentioned in Product Items you get. I have not got Tripod as they claimed to be it is one of the items in Kit. Surprised to see that even 16 GB memory card has its own problems. I am using my own 8GB memory card now. I went through other reviews and found that Kit is bad but now i am experiencing it. Camera is good but additional things that come up with it are really not worth to take its place next to this Canon Camera. I got a great deal and i am happy with that but that $100 i need to look for another purchase of items claimed to be in kit.

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! I'm no photographer, I'm 13 but I can tell you this is worth buying! The amount of things it comes with is a big plus! I use the case all the time! If I'm not usingthe camera, it's in the case! The tripod I use ALOT too! It's great for steady shots, and if you want to be on the picture and you don't trust anyone else to touch it (me...) then it comes with a wireless remote, it isn't the best and I recommend getting a better one or a wired one but it's still better than nothing! I don regret buying this at all! For beginning my photography class and doing nice far away and close ups this camera is great! It also came with the exact two lenses I wanted, 18-55mm and 75-300mm!!!!! I love taking close ups from a distance and that second lense (75-300mm) had it all! Beginners like me, looking for a "pre-professional" camera get this one! ( I also got a 3 year warranty for my clumsynes just in case... But that's separate and will show up around the screen when looking at or buying this AWESOME camera!)-Julia K. 13

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value Pack
Reviews.Author: Luis Salazar "Luis Bolsillo"
Reviews.Content: Camera and lens are excellent. Some of the items in the value pack no so much but still excellent value for the money paid.

Reviews.Title: Must bye
Reviews.Author: Binod yadav
Reviews.Content: I am not great fan of taking pictures ,but after buying this camera ,things changed .you can do lots of creative things with this camera .The combo is a great deal . I checked in lots of stores. I didnt get anything less than $599 for the body with EF 18-55 Lens and $100 discount on EF 75-350 Lens which cost 200 bugs . But with this deal you get EF 75-350 lens and lots of accessories within 50 bugs only ..Great..The remote i got ,didnt seems to be working with my TV ,Donno why . But rest of the accessories are good .

Reviews.Title: nice camera with lots of accessories
Reviews.Author: Dixie Lea
Reviews.Content: Great purchase. Never owned such a nice camera. Went to see my son since he owns a similar one and he showed me some basic tips. I love it...I need to practice using more tools on it before my cruise. Any photographer would love this camera I think.

Reviews.Title: Camera excellent, but don't buy the package
Reviews.Author: Robert "Robert"
Reviews.Content: I wish I would've read all the other reviews before I fell for this trap that seemed at the time like a great bargain. First off, it sounds like with all orders of this package, something is bound to come up missing. For example, mine didn't come up with Focus 5pc Dlx Lens Care & Cleaning Kit. The camera itself is great. As recommended by everyone else, don't kit this kit. You're better off just buying the camera and getting everything else on your own

Reviews.Title: Not worth it.
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: It come with more accessories, but compare to Nikon  this one no good.I owned both , but Nikon giving more picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Good package
Reviews.Author: Anna Bauler
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about buying this package after reading some of the reviews, but for someone who is getting started it is perfect.  I read that a lot of people were not happy with the quality of some of the accessories, but I found that mine were just fine and like I said, if you are just starting out, this is everything you need.  You can always upgrade from here.

Reviews.Title: I don't know why people are complaining.
Reviews.Author: Chelsey
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, it's my first DSLR and the DVD it comes with is very helpful. There is a lot of beginner pointers and it answers common questions about how to take common shots. All the odds and ends thing the camera comes with is definitely a bonus, but of course it's not top of the line stuff. I mean, you're paying for the price of the camera and second lens- and getting an entire surplus of goodies for what, 50-100 dollars more then the actually camera?? I'll take it. The tripod isn't the greatest thing, not like it ever claimed to be, but it works, and the battery life is so good!

Reviews.Title: Cannon 600D
Reviews.Author: dougs analysis
Reviews.Content: 1) Try to figure out every thing that came with the bundle.  Woops' it has a remote control, but it has nothing to do with the camera.  It is used to control your TV!!!!!  Just what I need is another controller for my TV and no remote control for the camera!!2) Start with reading a 300 page manual. Takes a couple of days to take it all in, if you want to get technical.  otherwise use auto setting, but wait again I want to take pictures of Humming birds in freeze frame without wing  movement so you need to read the manual a couple+ of times.3)  The camera takes great pictures and is fast enough to freeze the hummers.4)  Amazon to the rescue and resolved getting the correct remote control for the camera.  Thanks!!5) Be sure to read the fine print with this package deal!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Jeffry Burr
Reviews.Content: Great deal and equipment. Everything you need! Don't use some of the parts but it's all here for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal on Canon Rebel t3i
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey Newman
Reviews.Content: Excellent package deal from Focus. Loving the camera, esp. for sports. With the continuous sharing feature and shot stabilization. Canon's a great product.

Reviews.Title: Pictures with hight Quality
Reviews.Author: Daniel Rici da Silva
Reviews.Content: The complete package is really impressive, with it you have almost everything you need, the  thing there is missing, and to me a problem in every package like this is lens to take pictures inside home without to much ilumination, the len 18-55 is good, but there is another one to much better, If I'm not wrong the correct one should be one 70-something, but it is not a package problem, it's a problem that comes with all the cameras I've researched. I recoment this product for al the people that want learn a little bit more about taking pictures and appreciate good pictures.

Reviews.Title: as promised!
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: My order was absolutely everything I was expecting it to be, including every item in the bundle.  Arrived today, toyed with for hours and Beyond pleased!!

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price, but...
Reviews.Author: Senator
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses are great. In fact, everything except the tripod and remote is above expectation. And I may change my opinion on the remote if I can ever figure out how to use it. Should be simple, right? Read the remote instructions. Well, the remote is for controlling a TV, so it's instructions tell you how to do that. No help. Read the camera's manual. All it tells you to do is put the camera in timer/remote mode. Check. Nothing happens. Okay, ask for help here, and through the seller (Focus Camera) as well. Got some responses here, but none have really gotten me any closer to actually using the remote. Focus Camera's response, and I kid you not, was "ask Amazon". Really?I had read that some folks received a cheap memory card, but I received a Sony 16GB Class 10 card. No complaints. The bag is a Vivitar bag that holds everything except the tripod, and believe me, you won't care because the tripod is so cheaply made you'll want to replace it.Like I said, the kit is still worth the price of $649 considering the camera and two lenses at Wally World will set you back around$800. Through away the tripod and possibly the remote and you still have a solid T3i kit for reasonable money.

Reviews.Title: MISSING PIECES
Reviews.Author: Robin MacGregor
Reviews.Content: I did not receive the complete package!Missing:Lens Care and Cleaning Kit25 Free Quality PrintsLCD Screen ProtectorsMemory Card Wallet

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Vicki L. Williams
Reviews.Content: If your just learning about photography they send you a tutorial CD.  I really like it because it goes over all of the information for these professional cameras, and tells you all about the settings.  Since we are still learning about ours, we havens used it to its potential but so fare we love it! The photos come out beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Favorite
Reviews.Author: Kierra Dianne
Reviews.Content: This is my absolute favorite purchase on Amazon overall. It is a really good deal, and everything still works perfectly after 11 months of owning it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jaime Quenneville
Reviews.Content: All I can say love it!!!!! So happy...What a great camera. Great pictures and easy to use. Would buy all over again.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: ddmcneill

Reviews.Title: My canon rebel t3i

Reviews.Title: Just Do It

I purchased this particular kit because I liked the compartments in the camera bag.  Everything fits nicely.  Battery charged quickly and the camera shot perfectly right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy
Reviews.Author: Kyle Nimmo
Reviews.Content: This package is a great buy. The camera works flawlessly and takes awesome pictures. Case and tripod are of good construction as well. I would definitely buy this again.

Reviews.Title: All I needed and more

Reviews.Content: Love my camera and the items that came along with it helped greatly too. I'm looking forward to utilizing all the capabilities of my new tool

Reviews.Title: Thinking about returning it...ACTION SHOTS ARE HORRIBLE.
Reviews.Author: Mzindira
Reviews.Content: Great value for all that you get, but the CAMERA has issues. I bought it for my husband for Christmas since we're expecting this month. Unfortunately, it has a glitch where sometimes it will take quite a few minutes to focus and not permit you to take pictures in this window it will just randomly click and there will be no focus and no photo. It's super disappointing as we try to take pictures of our puppies and they move so much\. It's TERRIBLE for action shots, they're just a blur and the shutter speed is too low anyway. It always seems to get them right AFTER the cute moment, which as a soon-to-be first time mom, I'm not looking forward to having replicated on a kid :( It's a good value, the reviews of the camera on Amazon proper are good, I'm hoping it's just a glitch with this model because it's too late for a refund :(

Reviews.Title: Good camera, average to below accessories
Reviews.Author: DocO
Reviews.Content: I've had this bundle for a little over a month now and have gone through several thousand shots.  It takes amazing shots and is a great beginner to intermediate class camera.  The supplied lenses allow for a good range of shooting preferences.  Beware no stabilization on the 300mm lens.  You can go many places and read long and well thought out reviews on the camera itself so I won't bother to do that here.  It's a well known and generally well liked unit.  That being said, the remainder of this package is what I'll focus on.  If you ended up looking a this package because it includes so many accessories in one buy, rethink that decision.  You can buy much better accessories for the price.  The bag is below average.  It's very flimsy and mine came with one zipper compartment already broken (zipper didn't work).  It does have a decent divider inside and the thickness is ok to protect the camera.  The card reader is also below average and unable to read my high speed SD XC cards.  It reads the supplied card just fine, but that's another matter..  The supplied card is an SD HC.  At 16 gig, it won't take too long to fill that up and also is slower than my preference of an SD XC card, which is the best choice if you want to take hi def video.  The miniature remote, which I suppose can be used to control the shutter remotely, is at best a three dollar item.  The tripod is lightweight, which is good for portability, but besides that, is average to below average in functionality.  I've not had a chance to put the additional battery to the test as the supplied battery with the camera is simply amazing and seems to last forever.  To sum it up, if you're looking to buy this camera, buy the camera and not this bundle.  Then go buy quality accessories that you want.  I wish I would have done that.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: michael trimble
Reviews.Content: Outstanding camera.  I'm getting back into photography after a long time out and this camera helps when I forget settings.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Rolando Hoyt
Reviews.Content: Very Good .The pakage is complete for my son that is starting in Photo.The Price excelent instead of market.

Reviews.Title: Daughter's Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: T. Purvenas
Reviews.Content: This is our daughter's first semi-professional camera and she loves it. The kit provides everything that she needs to get going and is in love with camera and is taking pictures and videos all the time. The quality of the photos are great and she loves the extra lens. It seems to be easy to use and mechanically all of the functions seem to work well. With all of the additional equipment she it ready to embark on her photography adventure with all she could possibly want. This set was less expensive that just the camera at some of the big box stores so there is a much better value with this kit. It takes good action shots for a digital camera and has a lot of "film" photography emulation features that you can use, but it is still easy to use and you can then supplement your photography with those effects. It was the right price point for us between the less expensive video/simple cameras and the very expensive professional models that cost thousands.

I have done some price-checking at local camera shops since taking delivery, and I can verify that all that the kit I purchased offers a VERY considerable discount over buying everything at retail!  My only complaint is the tripod, which is somewhat rickety and I wouldn't trust not to sway in a breeze.  I bought a GorrilaPod after the fact and I think will offer much more stability and security.  All in all, for an amateur like me, I fully recommend this package.  Well worth it!!!

The first thing I noticed was the awesome speed.....no more waiting for that shutter to snap, and no more waiting for the memory card to read the photo.  I love this camera.  This camera makes all my prior cameras seem like toys, and when I add up the money they cost, I spent more than enough to get this Rebel T3i long ago.  So glad I made the move.  I won't use any other type of camera again. This kit was a great value for the money.  Thanks Amazon and Focus Camera.

I know someone else commented on the off-brand spare battery, but I found that it works just as well as the original.  Overall I'm very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Title: You will NOT find a better deal...
Reviews.Author: Queensryche
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Canon T3i bundle based 100% on customer feedback and price.  I couldn't be more happy with it.  This is my first SLR camera and I have zero experience with still photography.First, you will NOT find a better price anywhere.  After receiving my bundle, I went to best buy to compare and verify the deal and I have to say I was surprised as I was relieved...  Here are the prices from Best Buy.$599.99  Canon EOS Rebel T3i$199.99 Canon EF 75-300 Zoom LensAlready saved $100 right there, but it doesn't stop with that...$15.00  Extra battery$30.00  Wireless Remote$35.00  16 or 32 GB HD SD Card (I picked up a 32 on sale but camera comes with 16)$10.00  UV Filter$20.00  Circular Polarized Filter$20.00  Florescent Light Filter$10.00  LCD cut to size screen protector packI'm not sure if the instructional DVD is included with the camera at Best Buy, but I saw the exact same DVD for sale on its own for $30.00.  The Tri-pod and carry case are crap / cheap and will need to be replaced so I give them $0 value, but hey they do work and you can use them until you save up to buy better ones.  I bought a real nice back pack case for $40.So not even including the cheap case and tripod there's an extra $140 in accessories.  So all in all this bundle saves you $240 over buying in retail at Best Buy.Now for the camera... WOW what a lot of fun.  Spent the entire paswt weekend in my back yard taking pictures of everything I could think of in manual mode.  I watched some youtube videos on how to use an SLR and I'm finding it a fun challenge.  I spent my Sunday out on the front lawn practicing taking pics of passing car license plates.  Within an hour I noticed a huge improvement in my focus ability as well as speed.  Like anything in this world, if you wanna be good at something you got to practice.  I would not suggest using this camera for the first time at your daughter's wedding.  Practice before you need it.  After a few days of using the manual mode I tried the Automatic and found it worked pretty good.  Pictures were taken super fast and the automatic settings were spot on in some cases.  My goal is to learn how to use it on manual 24/7.The built in flash is nice.  Provides a lot of light but from what I've been told, I will probably end up buying an external down the road when my skills improve.  But for simple party / dinner time use, the flash works great for me.The camera battery life is also very good.  I think I took upwards of 1,000 pictures on a single charge.  Over the weekend I only replaced the battery pack once.  I will say I did not spend much time reviewing the pictures on the LCD.In conclusion, as my first DSLR I couldn't be more happy with this Canon T3i and the bundle here on amazon.com.  In just the first hour I was taking some of the best pictures I have ever taken on any camera I have ever had before.  With all the accessories and things to add onto the camera in addition to an overwhelming (at this time) number of options and settings on the camera... I believe the camera will be all I ever need as an amateur / recreational photographer.I highly recommend the camera to anyone.  I also highly suggest that you practice, practice and practice.  "RTFM"  Read The %&*@? Manual and/or watch the DVD and/or watch youtube.  I had 2 co-workers try and talk me out of purchasing an SLR due to their poor experiences, thank god I did not listen.  Now I have shown my co-workers a couple of the simple tips and tricks I learned (Like having both the Lens AND the Camera in AF or MF mode) and they are now enjoying their cameras as well.
