The instructional video was excellent for first time users and my son is already a pro in the making using different lenses and videos for you tube.  Everything included was excellent quality and the add ons were from canon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: Brian Duncan "methos"
Reviews.Content: This package is such an incredible value. The camera takes awesome pictures and the A/F on the lenses, makes an expert out of anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great DSLR for a Novice
Reviews.Author: Howard W. Pepper Jr.
Reviews.Content: It has been 30 years since I last used an SLR camera (Canon AE-1), and when I got bit by the photography bug, I decided to try the Canon EOS Rebel T3i.  The kit I bought sounded like a good deal, so I purchased it.  It is really pretty good for a novice.  The lenses are adequate (and for most people, will be all they need), and the rest of the goodies that come in the kit are good to fair, depending on your outlook.I've only been using the camera for a couple of weeks, but am enjoying it immensely.  The built-in auto functions are nothing short of spectacular in their ability to help a beginner take really good pictures.  I am reading through the "Canon EOS Rebel T3i/600D: From Snapshots to Great Shots" book, slowly learning more about the creative mode.  Perhaps I will update this review in a few months, after I've become a bit more used to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for our daughter. She was so excited when she opened the box. After researching several options like purchasing these items seperately I found that this package was a great buy! There is a difference between the T3i and the T3. The T3i has an adjustable viewing screen that pulls away from the camera body, the T3 does not. In addition the T3i has higher resolution than the T3, that is why I purchased the T3i. Shipping was right on time. We couldn't be happier with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: All you really need to know...
Reviews.Author: pcbarton
Reviews.Content: If this is your first DSLR, you'll be happy with everything in this kit.  From the tripod to the camera bag, its perfect for beginners in the DSLR field.  The battery is good and comes with charger.  You end up with two and they charge relatively quickly.  The lens are wonderful as well.  You will not be disappointed if your a beginner.  If you're a pro, you'll want a better tripod, memory card, camera bag, etc.  We can't all be pros right out of the shoot.  Bottom line, excellent kit for the money.  Can't beat the lens and image quality.  You'll be more than satisfied many times over.  All items in the kit are well thought out and grouped.  Camera bag is perfect for your gear.  Perfect for first time DSLR owners.

Reviews.Title: The camera is amazing but the accesories are so-so.
Reviews.Author: Banco Len "jose then"
Reviews.Content: Title says basicly all. As someone else already said you will probably have to buy all the accesories separately because the quality of them is extremely bad.

Reviews.Title: nice combo package
Reviews.Author: Leigh Frederick
Reviews.Content: our camera came with everything described, the shipping was quick..the only problem we found so far was that perhaps the tripod is a little too lightweight for the camera with the telephoto lenz on..as it blew over in the wind and fell overmy heart skipped a beat..but the camera has no issues

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the beginner!
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: So very pleased with this product and all it came with. Great package for the beginner to start shooting with.

Reviews.Title: Mother's day gift
Reviews.Author: Lisa Turner
Reviews.Content: i like the camera. still have alot to learn on it. haven't downloaded anything yet. looking forward to mastering this camera

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Maria F.
Reviews.Content: The cam takes great pictures. The bag is not one of the best but works. I am very happy and pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: great, great camera
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: soon I should be shooting like a pro or close to one :)this camera is awesome. solid mid entry level DSLR IMO.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: We ordered this bundle and everything with the order went smoothly. It arrived as expected, there was no damage to the packaging and the equipment is great!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Tammie Rowland
Reviews.Content: I finally broke down and bought a DSLR and am glad I choose the Canon.  All the extras that came with it are great.

Reviews.Title: Non professional
Reviews.Author: Regena
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I am still familiarizing myself with all of the camera features. Can't wait for vacation photos.

Reviews.Title: bundle items
Reviews.Author: Lyla Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I got the bundle,  but not what was shown in the picture,there was  a different gaget bag, no 5 pc. delux cleaning & care kit, no pkg of LCD screen protectors or the TV remote flashlight. I did get a 3 pc filter kit,SLR gaget bag-,a different card wallet and battery charger.with extra battery. The tripod was what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: marlicia s.
Reviews.Content: Awesome purchase for a great price! I love this camera and it comes in handy for my business. It is my most important tool. I'm glad I bought it when I did. It is a life saver and works great. I could not be more satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: KIM
Reviews.Content: Even though I know very little about these cameras, I knew I wanted to try something different from my point and shoot, which has failed me too many times in very important situations. Straight out of the box this camera took awesome pictures. I still don't know a lot about what this camera can actually do but that will come in time. I can't imagine it would take any better pictures than it does right now. I'm literally still in awe over the clarity and quality of pictures it takes. If you're like me and have been using a point and shoot camera but want something more where you won't have to miss those special moments, then this is the camera for you. Easy to use straight out of the box. I bought the combo kit that has a bag, memory card,, tripod, extra battery, 2 lenses with it and a few other things I have forgot and they're not with me at the moment. It has everything you need to start taking good, quality pictures. First of all, I read several reviews that said the bag was worthless. I honestly can't find anything wrong with it. I bought another case just based on those reviews. New case is great but just a tad smaller. Both are very sturdy.People have been complaining about the extra battery not being make by Canon. Yes the battery feels lightweight compared to the Canon but it lasted every bit as long as the canon battery did. I put the generic battery in and was able to take around 400+ shots without changing it. And that was with me playing with it a lot, like changing focus, continuous shot shooting, and lots of time viewing my pictures.Haven't used the tripod yet but will when I get home. I've read it was plastic and won't hold up well. I'll update my review when I do.Transferring pictures using the software provided is very easy. Love what you can do with the pictures to make them have special effects. There is something that came with the kit that allows you to remove the memory card, place the card into this thing and plug it into your computer. I'm sure it will be great for transferring pictures. Just haven't tried it yet. I've only used the transfer cable that came with it. It works great and pictures transfer quickly.I've only had my camera for about I week now and still love what it does. Hopefully, if I don't forget, I will update again when it's been six months.Well, hope this will help someone who is looking to buy a good camera to make a more educated decision. Can't wait to try it out on the grandkids now. Hope to get some good shots of them soon!!

Reviews.Title: Cannon t3i
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Camera and lens were great. Did not receive all accessories. Sent email through amazon. Receive one more item never received a response. 2 additional missing items have not been received as of this time (5/19/13). It has been about a month since email was sent. If accessories are what makes the sale, go somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: great pictures and easy to use.
Reviews.Author: 57Ford
Reviews.Content: the best part is that my wife is able to use it and loves it also. I would recommend this package to anyone looking for a camera and the price was more than fair.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera....Cheap Package
Reviews.Author: Jon Schryvers
Reviews.Content: We love the camera but the package that came with the camera is something to leave behind. I will have to purchase a better memory card, battery, and bag at some point...soon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Martha B
Reviews.Content: There is so much to learn about this camera. I am a new DSLR user, this kit had everything I needed to get started.

Reviews.Title: Upset with the quality of service from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Sreedhar Singan
Reviews.Content: I had purchased this bundle looking at the items that have been displayed. However, to my surprise I found that the HDMI cable and the lens cleaning set was not sent as promised on the bundle. The model of the bag is also different than what is being displayed. This is not what we expected from Amazon and their partners. The 75-300 mm lens is amazing addition to the bundle. I expect some one to reach out to us and provide us clarification and send us the missing items.

Reviews.Title: Happy with product, But...
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I love the Camera, I am not happy with the tri-pod, Very flimsy and does not produce good quality pictures because it is flimsy and cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera + extra goodies
Reviews.Author: Jamie Higgins
Reviews.Content: I've had a Canon Rebel in the past and decided it was time for a new one.  Picture quality is amazing & easy to learn if you are new to the Digital SLR world.  Take advantage of the manual!  The camera bag offers protection and storage, it's easy to get organized with the style of this bag.  The zoom lens is a major, major, add on in which I recommend to anyone to get those distance shots.  I love that this package included it.  Tripod is also a wonderful bonus to this package.  I am definately happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Tripod and camera bag are not good , Remote i got not working
Reviews.Author: Venugopal Chowdary
Reviews.Content: I love the camera , but the tripod and camera bag is not good.Tripod is of poor quality.Camera Bag is too small.It is not same as it is in the image displayed.Remote is not working :-(With lot of hopes i purchased this entire set , except the camera and lens remaining all add-ons are pretty ordinary..

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Camera takes fantastic pictures.  Have tried it in several different modes including videos and have not been disappointed.  Using it to mainly shoot fast action sports.  Freezes action sharply.  At night under lights, videos are bright.  Mainly using the 300mm lens.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: brian smith
Reviews.Content: This bundle package was more than expected.. if you add up all the pieces and price them out you will find it to be a very very good deal. Package was here in 2 days all safely wrapped would definately recommend

Reviews.Title: Unleash your creativity with this Kit
Reviews.Author: A.
Reviews.Content: Very conveniently priced. It has a lot of goodies, although truth to be told you won't be using all of them. The camera is a bit outdated but I've had plenty of fun with it.

Reviews.Title: Ease of use for beginners who want to go professional
Reviews.Author: Victoria L. Arel
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is easy for my family to use, automatic settings and I am learning how to use the manual modes.  Which, this camera make easy to do.  It takes great pictures, and the editing software is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson "J.J."
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived within the time specified and in great condition! I love using it to take pictures: portraits, landscapes, macro, anything! I take it with me as much as I can. The 75-300mm lens is fun to use to 'spy' on my friends, and later show them that I saw them.

Reviews.Title: Great Canon camera and Fantastic Price
Reviews.Author: ladyj2668
Reviews.Content: I have been pricing this camera at several different retailers and this was by far the best deal. It included some great accessories and a much needed tripod. With Amazon Prime, I got two day shipping which was great. This camera is easy to use right out of the box and comes with an instruction manual to explain the different features. The lenses attach within seconds for a quick change. This bundle is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: exelant product
Reviews.Author: Jack Buckenmeyer
Reviews.Content: we are very happy with our camera. user friendly and a joy to take pictures with. great price for all that we got with the camera. we took it on a trip and took 2000 pictures with it. hard to take one that didn't turn out well. we enjoy the quality with next to no editing for a balanced picture other brands we heard require more editing. took lots of pictures with a small window of time. And the capture speed was impressive. a real reliable work horse. I did not want to pay that much for a camera and found out I didn't know what i was missing.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Michael Paciorek
Reviews.Content: What a nice camera. I have a lot to learn on this camera, but it will be fun. I have every thing I need with the package, so I'm ready to go and get some great nature shots and grandchildren having fun and learning to crawl and then walk.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera & Additional Lens, but accessories are cheap
Reviews.Author: Roland Felix
Reviews.Content: This the best price for a bundle that includes the camera body & 2 lenses, but I will mostly likely buy better accessories such as the carrying bag, tri-pod, & SD card.  The filters are neat though. I absolutely love this camera.  As an intro into DSLR photography, its easy to use and it take amazing pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: maflazaric
Reviews.Content: I had to change my old camera and I chose this one, which is great. The only thing is that the memory card sometimes doesn't work properly and the camera tells me I have to reset it.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel
Reviews.Author: M. Reetz "More Book Space"
Reviews.Content: I have always used Canon cameras. Loved them all. The Rebel T3i is no exception. The package has more to it than I imagined; extra battery, remote control, etc. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very versitile camera.  The 18-55mm lense is stabilized, but the telephoto 75-300mm is not stabalized.
Reviews.Author: DougO "DougO"
Reviews.Content: The Canon camera body has so many features that I'm still learning how to use all of them.  The auto exposure and auto focus both work well.  If you just want to do point and shoot photography when you unpack the camera; that is possible too.  The camera also has the full capabilities required for either auto or user controlled portrait work, still life, sports, landscape, and telephoto wild life photos.  I especially like the feature that allows you to get the camera to calculate the required amount of flash to prevent the over exposure of flash photos.  You can purchase nice to have items on line at low cost.  An infra red remote control ($6) allows you to pose with the family and take the picture.  A hand held flash can trigger the camera and onboard pop up flash for portrait work.  A hand held remote shutter switch ($6) plugs into the camera for tripod and telephoto work.  This package is assembled by the seller and you may be able to change some of the items for a small price increase.  The generic bag is a little tight for the camera and telephoto lens.  The tripod is light, but seems stable when weighted with the camera bag.  The 16GB memory card is an average speed and adequate for many still photos, but it should be downloaded after each day of active work.  I purchased a SanDisk Extreme SDXC 64GB memory card on line for $65.  The 45MB/sec recording speed allows more frames/second when shooting multi-shot motion.  You may be able to get the seller to upgrade the memory card for a small price increase.  The stabilized 18-55mm lens does seem to neutralize camera shake, but the 75-300mm lens in this package is not stabilized.  You may be able to get a stabilized telephoto lens if you want that feature.  However, the Canon EOS lenses are quite expensive, and they are the only ones that will work with the auto functions of the EOS camera.  Even the Canon 2X tele extender with EOS contacts costs $300, while a similar T2 mounted 2X extender without the EOS contacts costs $20.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera!
Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on user reviews, and I LOVE it!!!  No matter how hard my husband and I try to take bad pictures they still turn out in focus and look good.  Even my 8 year old takes good pictures with this camera and has now decided he wants to be a photographer.  We all LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Steve Mitchell
Reviews.Content: It!s hard to take bad picture with this camera. For a newby in the photography you instantly taken care of with the extra accessories. This is one great pack.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Deal
Reviews.Author: Edwin Page
Reviews.Content: Overall this was a very nice package for the money. Both lenses were canon lenses. Both were auto focus but the telephoto did not have the stabilization. It came with extra battery w/charger, 16gb sd card, manuals, case and tripod. This was a really great deal. Don't get misled by the picture of the camera and accessories. The written description is more accurate.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It was a great deal and came with all kinds of extras! I am really excited to use it in the summer! My sister in law bought the same camera for the same price but it didn't come with the extra lens or any of the other extras, she only got the camera and bag.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Crislene Ap Arter
Reviews.Content: I choose this camera very good, perfect for the photos in my travell..I recommend this product...Tira fotos excelentes...

Reviews.Title: Canon Bundle Review
Reviews.Author: sofi seligman
Reviews.Content: So this was a very good deal, as a first time buyer of an expensive camera it was a really good deal. The Tripod was not really very good, and the remote is kind of random and unimportant, but in general, it's a great deal with some great equipment.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: JennieG
Reviews.Content: Great start with a bundle package like this! So many possibilties with this camera,so much to learn, and eager to learn,just don't know where to start.  Very intimidating for beginners.  Stick with the point and shoot type of camera if you are not willing to expand on photography, it would be a waste of money if you don't use the features to it's full capacity.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Amy G. Van Hoose "Amy"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!!  It takes awesome pictures!!  I had seen reviews that said it was hard to work, but I have had no trouble with it.  Did I mention that it takes awesome pictures?!?!  I am so very happy that I bought this camera and would buy all over again.  You are not going wrong by getting this one!!

Reviews.Title: It is a good camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Dale F Feuerborn
Reviews.Content: I like this camera.  It takes good quality pictures and movies.  It doesn't take a long movie, but it is good for a movie that is just a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Great starter kit!
Reviews.Author: Poslla28
Reviews.Content: Bought this item as a present for a family member.  They used to do photography back when 35mm was all the rage.  This kit definitely helped him get back into photography.  Comes with everything needed to get up and going with photography.

Reviews.Title: Excelente cámara
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: Excelente. Todo con lo que viene es demasiado útil. Las fotos son perfectas. Con esta cantidad de accesorios no hay necesidad de volver a comprar algo más.

Reviews.Title: Great Product with great price
Reviews.Author: E. Lazartic
Reviews.Content: Arrived as described and is a great camera.  I did need some followup on the backup battery, but it was handled quickly and efficiently.

Reviews.Title: Love my Rebel!
Reviews.Author: robin semler
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR camera after wanting one for quite a while.  Although it is definitely a learning process, the camera is everything I had hoped it would be and user friendly on top of that. What's more.. I had it in 24 hours after I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: So far so good! I'm just learning though!
Reviews.Author: Shandybar
Reviews.Content: I love the camera- I'm just starting photography, but I love how the camera handles- endless features and it's great for beginners and experienced photographers!

Reviews.Title: Canon t3i
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: Purchased for teenage son for Christnas. He loves it! I have played around with it as well. Video is clear and easy to use. Sports setting great for basketball games. Quick shutter and pictures are clear even though subject is moving very fast. We have had no problems. Seems to be a very nice camera. Especially for my teenager to learn on.

Reviews.Title: Camera is good.
Reviews.Author: matthew
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but wish I would have listened to the other reviews. The bag is cheap it falls apart. Memory cars is good class 10 and the tripod is cheap.

Reviews.Title: Phenominal camera package!!
Reviews.Author: David L
Reviews.Content: I rated this camera a five because this camera package has everything one needs to start either as a hobby or becoming more of an enthusiast in photography.Highly recommend this camera package for anyone interested in photography!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Starter kit
Reviews.Author: JMStuker
Reviews.Content: Great starter kit with 2 great lenses. The only con to this kit is the bag is kind of cheap. But that can be replaced fairly cheap.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: JessicaSato
Reviews.Content: Even for amateur photographers it's an excellent option !And the kit is amazing ! Has everything you may need !

Reviews.Title: T3i SLR Camera review
Reviews.Author: Spring Flower "m"
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this camera to replace an outdated one.  We read all the reviews but still purchased this one.  We are not professional photographers but like the ability to switch out the lenses, the camera is quite large and not ideal for family vacation photos because you have to carry around all this equipment that goes along with it.  Overall, while the camera quality is good enough, for the price and the weight of carrying this camera around, I do not feel it was our best purchase.  We should have gone with a smaller camera (less expensive and less weight to carry around.  We needed a smaller camera, same quality of photo or thereabouts due to size, for less $$.  We do regret our purchase but not because of quality of camera, just the overall simplicity of taking family photos is not quite as easy as it use to be.

Reviews.Title: New to this
Reviews.Author: SMR
Reviews.Content: I was so excited about my new camera.  I have been wanting one for two years.  Merry Christmas to me!  It works great.  The Canon T3i shoots HD film which is great.  It is fairly easy to use but make sure to read the manual first.Some of the items did not come with the product as shown.  When I contacted the seller, they apologized and I had the missing products within 48 hours.  The bag is super flimsy so my husband purchased the Canon Rebel bag (which is awesome!)Overall, play with the settings and try different lighting.  It is a great camera and well worth the wait!

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Tadd Eubank
Reviews.Content: Shipping was fast, product was exactly what I expected. The travel bag was a little cheap but all in all a great deal.  Can't wait to take more pictures!!! Love the Camera

Reviews.Title: Rebel Bundle
Reviews.Author: Diana Balcerzak
Reviews.Content: The camera was great.  However, I had difficulty getting the entire bundle from Beach Camera.  When I called to tell them there were nine items missing they claimed that Amazon put a picture on that was different from the bundle they wanted advertised.  They did send most of the items that were missing, but still left out two that were pictured in the ad.  I would not do business with them again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome price for a great product..
Reviews.Author: Mark S. Buske
Reviews.Content: Awesome value for a top rated camera. Thank you for a great Christmas gift. Thank you for this wonderful offer.

Reviews.Title: Camera bag is garbage !
Reviews.Author: khol
Reviews.Content: All the Canon products are very good. Camera bag is a piece of garbage. Get ready to buy another one of some value.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera is good but the case was not what was shown in the picture and seems cheap along with the tripod. I should have bought them from a place I could have touched them.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Package
Reviews.Author: Avenger 9
Reviews.Content: Got the camera that I have always wanted and it came with a great package deal. Spent less on the whole package than I could have for just the camera and lens itself!!

Reviews.Title: Love the canon rebel t3i super bundle
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I really love my new camera and I am having a lot of fun learning all of it's features, It came with really good directions. After iI bought mine I told several friends about it and one of them ordered it as well, they loved it too.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves this camera
Reviews.Author: jbjdc
Reviews.Content: I bought this for her for Christmas this year and she absolutely loves it.  Easy to use.  Can't say enough about how happy she is with it.

Reviews.Title: BUEN ARTICULO
Reviews.Author: marco alcocer
Reviews.Content: BUEN ARTICULO Y COMPARTI ESTA INFORMACION A MIS AMIGOS Y FAMILIARES ADEMAS ES SEGURO LA COMPRA MUY SATISFECHO Y FELIZ

Reviews.Title: Great Product - poor shipping
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: i live in a relatively rural area and when i receive packages - they are always dropped at my front door as my mailbox is down a very long dirt driveway. for some reason, this package was left on the street by my mailbox - and it rained later that day! had i not come home when i did, this could have easily been stolen or damaged in the rain... i love the camera but the battery i received does not charge, so that was disappointing too. but when it comes to the camera itself - i love it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing but this bag ia por
Reviews.Author: alexandre ricardo pereira
Reviews.Content: Amazing but this bag is a poor  Amazing but this bag is a poor Amazing but this bag is a poor

Reviews.Title: a very ugly bag
Reviews.Author: jagatdeep
Reviews.Content: The camera is good but the bag is very inconvinient, doesn't even look like as it is shown in the picture. Tripod os also littlr shaky.

Reviews.Title: Great product! better than advertised.
Reviews.Author: Ken Thames
Reviews.Content: I love the kit. Tripod is a bit weak, but it works for a newby! Has everything to start taking pics.

Reviews.Title: Camera bag and tripod cheap
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: The camera bag that came with the camera broke the first use. The plastic clasp broke off. The first time we used the tripod it also broke. Very very cheap quality.  Do not buy the bundle not worth it! Buy the camera separately.  The camera and extra lens are great.  I wish I would have listened to the reviews about the bundle.  The only reason I even gave 3 stars is because the camera is so great.

Reviews.Title: Great Item would recommend "BUT" pay attention to reviews.
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: I have read a lot of reviews on this item. Some people stated the quality of the accessories were okay but not the greatest. I not knowing a lot about camera's or equipment, was very satisfied withe the camera and lens. What a great camera. The delivery was great and packaging was okay. The accessories seem fine to me but like so many reviews stating parts missing in the order, I thought they would correct the problem. The memory card and the card reader was missing. I know this isn't much but, I expect you should get what you pay for. The old saying is if one says there is a problem, there might be a problem. If two says there's a problem you should maybe look into it. If three says there's a problem, sure enough there is a problem.

Reviews.Title: What a camera!
Reviews.Author: I Throgmartin
Reviews.Content: Love the Canon Rebel T3i.  So much control over the way I take my photos. Would recommend this camera to the photography enthusiast.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Maureen Splitgerber
Reviews.Content: We had initally looked at a similar package with this camera from Best Buy, but then found this deal that offered more extras at a better price. My daughter was thrilled getting this all for her 18th birthday and I looked likea hero!

Reviews.Title: I love the camera!!!
Reviews.Author: H. Xu "Charles"
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect camera for a beginner.  Very good quality, easy to use. You are able to just use basic functions for a lot of advanced purposes. I have taken a few sports pictures and got very good quality pictures. I feel like I am a pro now.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: I was really insecure about this purchase, but I have to say that I loved it. Everything that they were advertising arrived, and everything works well together. Just the bag is a little bit small, but even though, good enough.

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: J im "Jim"
Reviews.Content: Very high quality. Professional quality photographs. Have not found a better value anywhere believe me I check around. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: pretty satisfied with this seller.
Reviews.Author: Maheshwar
Reviews.Content: bought this canon t3i from "beach camera" for thanksgiving 2012, i am very satisfied with what they promised what they delivered, and the product is pretty good. i suggest you buy the bundle deal for 649.00 $ which includes canon t3i, 55-70 mm lens, 75-300 mm lens, bag, 16GB SDHC, tripod.

Reviews.Title: Its not just good, its the best camera...
Reviews.Author: suggestion
Reviews.Content: This product works great. Good choice for a starters. No problems till now. Only thing is you need to have complete understanding what you want to do with this product and how you can do with this. Anyways enjoy with this cool gadget...

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera, Kit just ok.
Reviews.Author: James A. Smith "iflyplanes"
Reviews.Content: First off the Camera is amazing, I couldn't be more pleased!The kit however leaves a bit to be expected.  I bought the kit over just the camera because the price difference is minimal for a bunch of extra items.  Overall the items are on the lower end of the spectrum, not great quality but they still work like they should.Camera bag- Cheap bag, only offers one large compartment with one divider, doesn't do a good job at keeping things separate.Tripod- Kinda flimsy, but serves its basic purposeInstructional dvd-  Mine was a burned copy of jumpstart video, the video is very basic and dated (copyright of 2007) but covers the basics.everything else in the kit is pretty self explanatory.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera & Lenses; sub-par complementary items
Reviews.Author: Isaac
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses were perfect. The rest of the items included in the package were cheap. I will probably be getting replacements for everything except for the camera and lenses. It was delivered quickly and you CANNOT beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Great package for the price.
Reviews.Author: Greg M Ahaszuk
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a Christmas present for my girlfriend.  She's been wanting a DSLR for awhile now, and this package deal was great for her.  All products in this deal are quality.  Lenses are both Canon, and came in factory original boxes, as well as the camera body (read a review where a buyer claimed they were not packaged).  The SD card is also a Class 10, and is not a "generic" brand.  The tripod and camera bag are decent for a pieced together deal, and are good enough for what she needs.  The only thing I wish that came with the kit are UV filters for the lenses.  I'm going to order some ASAP for her.All in all, this was a great packaged deal, and I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Beware of accessory substitutions
Reviews.Author: Timothy D. Schuy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my son as a Christmas gift.  Amazon did a great job of packing and delivering the camera and met customer promise. But upon opening the box and doing an inventory of the items, I found several substitutions made with the supplied accessories.  Most of the items were not the Focus brand and were replaced with Cheap Chinese knock-offs.  Given that this camera is sold through Amazon and actually comes from Beach Camera, the option for replacement is not available.  So the customer is left with an option to return the item and get a refund a few days later.  So buyer beware with this purchase..

Reviews.Title: Cheap camera
Reviews.Author: MEIQIAN C.
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery. The item is good and cheap. because we only are beginner about using it, we have to know it further.

Reviews.Title: What? No stabilization in the long lens? What was Canon thinking? Cutting some $ at a high cost!!!!
Reviews.Author: vicki fikes
Reviews.Content: The camera is fine. It is the 75-300mm that I have a problem with. I have a 55-250mm that I got with the T1i some years ago. The lens that came with that kit had image stabilization in them since the camera does not have it in the body. I had NO idea that this new kit I bought came with a lens without stabilization. I absolutely wouldn't have purchased this kit had I realized this. I will most likely try to sell this new lens as it is worthless to me. I use these longer lens in my kayak photography where more stabilization is extremely important. WHY in the world would Canon even bother making a lens like this given the camera body. I realize that it must be the cheaper cost of making this darn lens. Urgggggg!!!!!!  Super disappointed. Realized the issue after I had already taken off on a 16 day trip. Too late to do anything about it. The farther out the lens goes, THE MORE IMPORTANT it is to have stabilization. It is ridiculous Canon!

Reviews.Title: Excelente Servicio
Reviews.Author: Robertoa Andres Cornejo Loyola
Reviews.Content: Cumplió completamente mi expectativa de compra, llego en la fecha sin problemas de embalaje a mi casilla en Miami y desde ahí a mi dirección en Santiago de Chile, América del Sur

Reviews.Title: grande compra
Reviews.Author: cazaes
Reviews.Content: fui bem atendido e a compra chegou dentro do prazo.A empresa foi atenciosa.Boa compra. recomendo as pessoas que desejarem uma SLR.A camera atende as necessidades e grava videos, o que a maioria das slr nao faz.

Reviews.Title: Canon t3i
Reviews.Author: Aigerim
Reviews.Content: Probably, you will find it to be expensive, but it does worth it. I was pleasantly surprised when have camera delivered. It has both lenses, tripod, memory card and many other accessories I didn't expect. Strongly recommend.P.S: I am taking great pics with it already =)

Reviews.Title: I really recommend it!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I've received all items in the photo. The camera is AMAZING! and I loved the camera lens, and the items included are really useful! The seller was very fast to deliver it and also very fast to reply my emails. Great!

Reviews.Title: I have problems with products
Reviews.Author: Fernanda Patrocinio
Reviews.Content: The second battery of the kit has a fault: it does not fit the camera, so I cannot use it.I would like to know if you can solve this problem.Besides, I bought this camera mainly because of its extra battery.Sincerely yours.

Reviews.Title: I would not recommend
Reviews.Author: john H  rice
Reviews.Content: I gave this a gift and it did not have the lens that it said it would have!  I would not purchase again!

Reviews.Title: overrated price
Reviews.Author: Hy
Reviews.Content: Price is not reasonable at all when comparing other DSL. Most accessories are trash. the price is much much overrated!

Reviews.Title: Canon Bundle Package
Reviews.Author: Lemenuel D.
Reviews.Content: Everything that came in the bundle came 100% as advertised. The camera itself is a quality product. My only problem with the package is with the tripod. My father bumped into it on our living room carpet and I watched it fall slower than a feather to the ground. This fall somehow cracked one of the plastic legs. This happened the day we were setting it up and it's quite possibly the cheapest quality equipment I've ever received.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera...
Reviews.Author: Gtrguy93
Reviews.Content: So happy with all the results.My only complaints with the package:  The tripod is a toy. I wouldn't trust it with my point and shoot, much less my T3i  It should include a 32GB card  The TV remote did not work on my Toshiba TVBut the camera... AMAZING!

Reviews.Title: raise price
Reviews.Author: ingrid saez
Reviews.Content: Why you promote this product for $1099.99 over 40%off in $669.?  You raise the price from$709 up$1099.Your promotion is only 6% off.I never gonna buy any others product in the future with you guys.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Julio Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: We got this camera for my sister, she loves it in any way, it's a great above-the-mid-range camera, shes is a photograph beginner so we are all happy that she is, great camera.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Malek Williams
Reviews.Content: No only was this the most expensive thing I have purchased on Amazon, this was the best deal and NO DAMAGES OR SHORT COMINGS. I recieve everything in the picture and it seems like more. It took two days to ship and I am so excited to get started. Thanks Focus!

Reviews.Title: Excellent equipment!! The entire kit is great!
Reviews.Author: Cristiano
Reviews.Content: The camera is great! Although I have not learned everything from it but I can take excellent pictures with it. Besides, the kit has many accessories that make this purchase a great option. I would recommend to beginners such as me. Got a great deal here!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Corbin
Reviews.Content: I was already familiar with the photo quality, because my roommate has the same camera.  I was a little concerned about trying to learn how to use the camera, but with a little Youtube, and the manual, it was very easy to figure out.  This is a great beginner's SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Eaglewolfbear
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera less than a week but so far I love it.  More complicated than my last camera but I did buy that one 30 years ago...

Reviews.Title: Great bundle
Reviews.Author: haann
Reviews.Content: The order arrived on the last day of the estimated delivery date.I opened the package with some trepidation after reading the 1and 2star reviewsThe first thing I checked was the sd card SanDisk class 10 .so far so good.The tripod is lightweight but very sturdy. I have used the extra (non canon) battery all day and it holds a charge.The camera and lenses are of course Canon. And the photos and video are beautiful to see.I would highly recommend this bundle from Cardinal camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: ashley warner
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. It came with everything you need and is good quality stuff. Definitely happy with this camera and have enjoyed using it!

Reviews.Title: should be careful with accessories
Reviews.Author: Maryuritza Vegas
Reviews.Content: good if not for unsupported items introduced to the model of the camera such as remote and small tripod. you sould be carefull with accesories

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: linda m. haughey
Reviews.Content: bought this for my husband for Christmas and he just luves it...Perfect gift for him...He cant use it enough...Thanks for all the info on it...Takes the best pictures..

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Prakash
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, and probably the best one I have. The supplied camera bag is not good... The supplied bag is not suitable for SLR camera. Except Bag, Tripod, SD card (Sony), 75-300mm Lens are good.Five stars for Camera alone.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Jane Doh
Reviews.Content: read some reviews about products missing or poor grade SD card or other bad stuff... my package was anything but that, Camera is great, both lens' auto focus and Canon, SD card was 16gb Sony class 10, tripod is lightweight and sturdy enough considering how light it is, the SD card adapter that plugs in the USB port was different the one shown in the picture is just a for SD card, the one provided had multiple ports for different style of cards so it is better in my opinion. Overall extremely happy with my purchase and would recommend this to anyone. Was kinda worried after i made the purchase and read some reviews then went to Costco and saw the camera bundle with zoom lens (55-250mm) for $779 and wondered if the extra goodies were worth it and I would have to say yes they were and Costco is hard to beat usually

Reviews.Title: my first and loving it
Reviews.Author: S. Belete
Reviews.Content: It is my first dslr camera and it is unblieveably awsome. It comes with lots of accessory and dvd to learn about the camer. I played around with it, and i found it to be easy and confertable.. But i have to learn a lot about it to get the best out of it. I watched the dvd that comes with it too and learned something. I definetly recommend it for every body.

Reviews.Title: Its change my life!!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cadieux
Reviews.Content: AAAAAAAAmazing im s***ting in my pants each time i look at it!!!!! Do not buy one if you dont want the same problem!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Meg & Tom B.
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting one of these cameras sense I saw them and finally decided to purchase this canon T3i with lens and kit for the family

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Package
Reviews.Author: misom88
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy if you are just starting out. Between the bag, tripod and extra battery it is just what I needed for on location shooting.I would suggest however either buying an extra set of batteries, and the battery grip for the unit.Also, the SD card is not made for taking video, you need to get a different SD card like the Transcend Class 10 SD card to be able to save video. Otherwise it will stop recording after about 11 seconds on the card that comes with the package.Overall happy with the pack and great seller.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: worth a deal
Reviews.Content: It was a good deal, got bunch of accessories all worth using. In few words just loved the product. I researched a lot about this product but didn't find this deal anywhere.

Reviews.Title: simply great!
Reviews.Author: designmadness
Reviews.Content: Really great DSLR, love the quality of the video, the pictures come out awesome and the telephoto lens is just phenomenal. The product is a must-buy since you get tons of stuff which DO make a difference at the end of the day! Don't think twice if you want to get started in the DSLR world but with a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Ellen First time SLR
Reviews.Content: I am just learning the ropes with my Rebel T3i. I am in a photography class and have found out that this camera will do absolutely everything that I need plus more. Even my instuctor was quite impressed. I look forward to my class each week to find new things that I can do with my new camera. I LOVE IT !! Loved shopping at Amazon.. so easy to compare with other retailers.

Reviews.Title: Can't stop using this camera!! Love It Love It!
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: For a beginner photographer... this camera has made it so easy to grasp photography.. i recommend it to anyone looking for a good first time DSLR user camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera - baby tested
Reviews.Author: Ave
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item for my niece who lives in Europe. I got everything that was promised and on a great price. There was also a extra battery for the camera. I guess the seller just throw it in reading my mind. I was thinking of getting extra battery for the camera - nice. Great seller, nicely packaged. Safe and sound.

Reviews.Title: MANNY
Reviews.Author: MANNY
Reviews.Content: ITEM WAS RECEIVED ON TIME AS OFFERED BY DISTRIBUTOR, KIT WAS COMPLETE WITH ALL ACCESORIES. GREAT QUALITY PRODUCT. THANKS A LOT. MN

Reviews.Title: I am a beginner so  its the best camera I ever owned
Reviews.Author: Juan Manuel
Reviews.Content: I bought this camerae from davis max and was very pleased with the price and package. I am a beginner, this was a great investment, I am truly enjoying myself.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Kit!
Reviews.Author: Marcelo Reis
Reviews.Content: Very nice kit, well packed, fast delivery, very, very nice price! Very good deal for the money.  Worthy! Complete. The Camera is amazing, with 2 great basic lenses, a nice accessory kit and a very welcome replacement batery. Along with a nice tripod and other staff...

Reviews.Title: great kit
Reviews.Author: R. Strasbourg "R.S."
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent upgrade from my Rebel XS. The kit has more useful items than I needed but I will use about everything in it. Here's an excellent camera with more features than I care to learn about for now but I am already doing more with this camera than I did with my old one. Everything is easy to use and of good quality. The camera feels solid. Shipping was quick and without any problems. I recommend this kit to anyone who wants something a bit more serious than a point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera Purchase
Reviews.Author: Jean E. Vermeire
Reviews.Content: This was a great transaction! Will to business with this company in the future! Outstanding!  The camera is so eay to use,a beginner like me is taking amazing pictures!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Mar
Reviews.Content: I just got my camera and I LOVE it! It's absolutely my favorite camera I've ever had! the shipping took a little longer than i expected, I ordered standard shipping, so if you are in a hurry for your camera get faster shipping service. The overall package was not too bad. Others commented on not getting the full 16gb memory card, but mine did, also I read that someWere missing some items but I actually got every item, and it's a great starter kit. The tripod looks as if it may get bent up easily, but it's a great starter. The 2 lenses are great and I couldn't be happier with my purchase! I reccommend purchasing this set, apposed to purchasing the camera alone. All items that were promised in the item description, were in my package. Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: just great
Reviews.Author: Jeronimo Pizarro
Reviews.Content: There's nothing new to say about this camera. Excellent picture quality, great HD video. the package is very convenient.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great pics right out of the box!
Reviews.Author: Pirate Pics
Reviews.Content: I am not sure what other reviewers issues were on this EOS T3i package deal.  This came with all that was advertised and pictured.  All of the extras were as top notch as the camera itself.  I have taken over 5000 images in just 4 weeks with this and have gotten many accolades from friends and family.  From many pro quality actions shots at football games to lightning pics, and astrophotography as well.  It is a blast playing with it around the campfire and trying out different settings.  This is the best purchase I have made in years!!! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Trung
Reviews.Content: Simply put, I got what I paid for. $1126 deeply hurt me, with me being a college student, but I can't say I don't regret it at all.
